articles.title: Thailand to end quarantine for some vaccinated visitors from Nov, says PM - TODAYonline
articles.description: BANGKOK — Thailand will end coronavirus quarantine requirements for vaccinated visitors from 10 low-risk countries starting Nov 1, prime minister Prayuth Chan-ocha said on Monday (Oct 11), as the Southeast Asian nation tries to revive its pandemic-hit economy.
